Text: Consulting Services Agreement Cc Kay Steve Plauche asked me to send you a copy of the current agreement with ENA cited in the work order request for the Connecticut project You will note the agreement expires at the end of this month Please fax the signed work order to my attention at today as Steve has directed us to begin work immediately and attend a meeting tomorrow Also it would be a great help if you could provide a letter extending the term of the agreement to October Please call me if you have any questions Joe Curreri Vice President Power Generation Services Nagog Park Acton MA phone ext fax email ENA Consulting Services Agreementpdf The information contained in this communication is confidential and privileged proprietary information intended only for the individual or entity to whom it is addressed Any unauthorized use distribution copying or disclosure of this communication is prohibited If you have received this communication in error please contact the sender immediately It is our policy that emails are intended for and should be used for business purposes only This footnote also confirms that this email message has been swept by MIMEsweeper for the presence of computer viruses ENSR wwwensrcom ENA Consulting Services Agreementpdf

Consulting Services Agreement Cc Kay Steve Plauche asked me to send you a copy of the current agreement with ENA cited in the work order request for the Connecticut project You will note the agreement expires at the end of this month Please fax the signed work order to my attention at today as Steve has directed us to begin work immediately and attend a meeting tomorrow Also it would be a great help if you could provide a letter extending the term of the agreement to October Please call me if you have any questions Joe Curreri Vice President Power Generation Services Nagog Park Acton MA phone ext fax email ENA Consulting Services Agreementpdf The information contained in this communication is confidential and privileged proprietary information intended only for the individual or entity to whom it is addressed Any unauthorized use distribution copying or disclosure of this communication is prohibited If you have received this communication in error please contact the sender immediately It is our policy that emails are intended for and should be used for business purposes only This footnote also confirms that this email message has been swept by MIMEsweeper for the presence of computer viruses ENSR wwwensrcom ENA Consulting Services Agreementpdf

RE Enron Emission Services Cc Thanks Michael I checked out the web page as well and it looks real good Id like to invite you and Trevor to join my next monthly national conference call with my key power project managers to discuss your services and have some twoway QA Could you be available on at around am your time If so I can call in to you at that time Hope you can make it If not we can always arrange another time Joe Curreri Vice President Power Generation Services Technology Park Drive Westford MA phone ext fax email Original Message From Taylor Michael E mailtoMichaelE NRONcom Sent Wednesday October AM To Curreri Joe Cc Woods Trevor Subject Enron Emission Services Hello Joe Trevor Woods asked I send you our brochure Enron Emission Servicesdoc Michael Taylor Coal and Emissions Trading Enron Global Markets This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you The information contained in this communication is confidential and privileged proprietary information intended only for the individual or entity to whom it is addressed Any unauthorized use
